title: US Civics Quiz
description: This is the description for US Civics quiz

questions.question: How many seats does Colorado have in the US House of Representatives in the 117th United States Congress?

options.label: A
options.more: The delegation has a total of 7 members, including 4 Democrats and 3 Republicans. Members are: 1. Diana DeGette (Denver), 2. Joe Neguse (Boulder), 3. Lauren Boebert (Rifle), 4. Ken Buck (Greeley), 5. Doug Lamborn (Colorado Springs), 6. Jason Crow (Aurora), 7. Ed Perimutter (Lakewood).

options.label: B
options.more: Alaska, Delaware, Montana, North Dakota, South Dakota, Vermont and Wyoming only have one congressional district each.

options.label: C
options.more: California is the most populous U.S. state and as a result has the most representation in the United States House of Representatives, with 53 Representatives. Each Representative represents one congressional district.

options.label: D
options.more: Arizona is divided into 9 congressional districts.

questions.question: Who are the US Senators representing Colorado in the 117th United States Congress?

options.label: A
options.text: Senators Michael Jackson and Miley Cyrus
options.more: Michael Jackson and Miley Cyrus are not US Senators.

options.label: B
options.text: Senators Chuck Grassley and Chuck Schumer
options.more: Senator Chuck Grassley represents the state of Iowa and Senator Chuck Schumer represents the state of New York.

options.label: C
options.text: Senators Dick Durbin and Patty Murray
options.more: Senator Dick Durbin represents the state of Illionois and Senator Patty Murray represents the state of Washington.

options.label: D
options.text: Senators Michael Bennet and John Hickenlooper
options.more: Michael Farrand Bennet (born November 28, 1964) is an American businessman, lawyer, and politician who has served as the senior United States Senator from Colorado since 2009. John Wright Hickenlooper Jr. is an American politician, businessman and geologist serving as the junior United States Senator from Colorado, having defeated incumbent Cory Gardner in 2020. A member of the Democratic Party, Hickenlooper was mayor of Denver from 2003 to 2011 and governor of Colorado from 2011 to 2019.

questions.question: Who succeeded John Hickenlooper as the 43rd Governor of Colorado?

options.label: A
options.more: Dianne Primavera is the Lieutenant Governor of Colorado.

options.label: B
options.more: Jared Schutz Polis (/ˈpoʊlɪs/; born May 12, 1975) is an American politician, entrepreneur, and philanthropist serving as the 43rd governor of Colorado since January 2019. A member of the Democratic Party, he served one term on the Colorado State Board of Education from 2001 to 2007 and five terms as the United States Representative from Colorado's 2nd congressional district from 2009 to 2019. During his time in Congress, he was the only Democratic member of the libertarian conservative Liberty Caucus. He was elected governor of Colorado in 2018, defeating Republican nominee Walker Stapleton. As an openly gay man, Polis has made history several times through his electoral success. In 2008, he became the first same-sex parent elected to the United States Congress. In 2018, he became the first openly gay person and second openly LGBT person (after Kate Brown of Oregon) elected governor of a state in the United States. He is also the first Jewish person to be elected governor of Colorado.

options.label: C
options.more: Jena Griswold is the 39th Colorado Secretary of State, serving since January 8, 2019.

options.label: D
options.more: Dave Young is the Colorado Treasurer.

questions.question: How many counties are there in the state of Colorado?

options.label: A
options.more: The state of Texas has two hundred and fifty four counties.

options.label: B
options.more: The U.S. state of Colorado is divided into 64 counties. Counties are important units of government in Colorado since there are no townships or other minor civil divisions. Two of these counties, Broomfield and Denver, have consolidated city and county governments. San Juan county has a population of 699. El Paso county has a population of 622,263.

options.label: C
options.more: The state of New Hampshire has ten counties.

options.label: D
options.more: The state of California has fifty eight counties.
